sentence.Network_en: For further analysis of seismological interest, specific symmetries of the media need to be considered.
sentence.Network_cn: 为了进一步分析在地震学方面具有重要意义的问题, 必须考虑介质的特定对称性.

sentence.Network_en: The results can be as reference for sharing the seismological data.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果可作为开展地震科学数据共享工作的参考.

sentence.Network_en: There were 1,305 seismological monitoring stations and 35 remote monitoring network stations.
sentence.Network_cn: 全国共有地震台站1305个,地震遥测台网35个.
